props.title: Bella Vista Restaurant - Fine Dining Experience
What Makes Bella Vista Special

features.title: Farm-to-Table Cuisine
features.description: We source our ingredients from local farms to ensure the freshest flavors in every dish. Our seasonal menu changes to reflect the best of what's available.

features.title: Award-Winning Chef
features.description: Our executive chef brings 15 years of fine dining experience and has been recognized by prestigious culinary institutions for innovative techniques.

features.title: Curated Wine Selection
features.description: Our sommelier has hand-selected over 200 wines from around the world to perfectly complement our menu. Expert pairing recommendations available.

features.title: Private Events
features.description: Host your special occasions in our elegant private dining rooms. Perfect for corporate events, weddings, and intimate celebrations.

features.title: Intimate Atmosphere
features.description: Our thoughtfully designed interior features warm lighting, comfortable seating, and acoustics that create the perfect ambiance for romantic dinners and meaningful conversations.

features.title: Seasonal Tasting Menus
features.description: Experience our chef's creativity with rotating tasting menus that showcase the finest seasonal ingredients. Each course is paired with complementary wines for the ultimate culinary journey.

props.subtitle: Discover the unique elements that make dining with us an extraordinary experience.

props.title: Where Someone a Cherished Memory
props.subtitle: Indulge in our chef's carefully crafted dishes made with the finest locally-sourced ingredients. From intimate dinners to special celebrations, we create unforgettable dining experiences.

items.title: Grilled Salmon with Seasonal Vegetables
items.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection, served with roasted seasonal vegetables and our signature herb butter sauce.

items.title: Artisan Pasta Collection
items.description: Handmade pasta prepared daily with authentic Italian techniques. Choose from our rotating selection of seasonal sauces and toppings.

items.title: Artisan Cheese & Charcuterie Board
items.description: A carefully curated selection of imported cheeses, cured meats, and accompaniments. Perfect for sharing or as an elegant appetizer.

props.title: Chef's Recommendations
props.subtitle: Explore our most popular and beloved dishes, crafted with passion and precision.

props.title: What Our Guests Say
props.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied guests about their dining experiences.

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.quote: Absolutely phenomenal dining experience! The attention to detail in every dish was remarkable. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and made our anniversary dinner truly special.

testimonials.name: James Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: The farm-to-table concept really shines here. You can taste the freshness in every bite. The wine pairing was spot on and the ambiance was perfect for our business dinner.

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.quote: Best restaurant in the city! The chef's tasting menu was a culinary journey. We've been coming here for years and they never disappoint. Highly recommend for special occasions.

faqs.answer: We recommend making reservations at least 2-3 days in advance, especially for weekend dining. For special occasions or larger parties, we suggest booking 1-2 weeks ahead. Walk-ins are welcome but subject to availability.
faqs.question: How far in advance should I make a reservation?

faqs.answer: Yes, we offer several vegetarian and vegan options on our menu. Our chef is happy to accommodate dietary restrictions and allergies with advance notice. Please inform us when making your reservation about any special dietary needs.
faqs.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions and allergies?

faqs.answer: We have a smart casual dress code. While jackets are not required, we ask that guests avoid shorts, flip-flops, and athletic wear. We want everyone to feel comfortable while maintaining the elegant atmosphere of our restaurant.
faqs.question: What is your dress code?

faqs.answer: Yes, we have two private dining rooms that can accommodate groups of 8-25 people. These are perfect for business meetings, birthday celebrations, or intimate weddings. Please contact us directly to discuss availability and custom menu options.
faqs.question: Do you offer private dining for special events?

faqs.answer: We are open Tuesday through Sunday. Tuesday-Thursday: 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM, Friday-Saturday: 5:00 PM - 11:00 PM, Sunday: 4:00 PM - 9:00 PM. We are closed on Mondays. Holiday hours may vary.
faqs.question: What are your hours of operation?

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions
props.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about dining with us, reservations, and our services.

props.title: Choose Your Experience
props.subtitle: From intimate dinners to grand celebrations, we have the perfect package for every occasion.

props.hint: Join our newsletter for exclusive offers, seasonal menu updates, and event invitations.
props.title: Stay Connected with Bella Vista
props.subtitle: Be the first to know about new menu items, special events, and exclusive dining experiences. Join our community of food lovers.
